references.reason: This paper introduces the fundamental concept of label distribution learning (LDL), which is the core topic of the current research.

references.paper_title: Label enhancement by maintaining positive and negative label relation
references.reason: This is a highly relevant paper that directly addresses the problem of label enhancement using binary labels, providing a foundation for the proposed ternary label approach.

references.paper_title: Label distribution learning by maintaining label ranking relation
references.reason: This paper explores another important related method of label enhancement using label ranking, offering an alternative strategy to enhance labels for LDL.

references.paper_title: Predicting label distribution from multi-label ranking
references.reason: This paper presents a related approach to predicting label distributions, serving as a stepping stone toward the proposed ternary label method.

references.paper_title: Predicting label distribution from tie-allowed multi-label ranking
references.reason: This paper expands on the previous work by considering ties in multi-label ranking, enhancing the robustness and applicability of label distribution prediction.
